channel.title: I notice alot of people have trouble with compilers
channel.description:
if you get something like '[u]java not found[/u]'
right click on the compiler and change the jdk to your version.
if you get something like '[u]javac not found[/u]'
you need to re-download your jdk and register it so that the javac.exe file is saved.
if you get sumthin like '[u]100 errors[/u]'
your missing a bracket, if you have no idea where to put it then just undo what u did last.
hope this helped :D

item.title: I notice alot of people have trouble with compilers
item.dc:creator: @jackin_jill jackin jill
item.description:
@jackin_jill wrote:

if you get something like
‘java not found’

right click on the compiler and change the jdk to your version.

if you get something like
‘javac not found’

you need to re-download your jdk and register it so that the javac.exe file is saved.

if you get sumthin like
‘100 errors’

your missing a bracket, if you have no idea where to put it then just undo what u did last.

hope this helped
